name: Púca
description: The Púca is a large fey creature characterized by its beguiling abilities and cunning nature, preying upon unsuspecting travelers.
memorable: Its unique ability to charm travelers and disappear with them into a nightmarish landscape makes the Púca a formidable foe.
goals: The Púca seeks to lure and capture travelers, manipulating them for its own amusement.
relations: Púca may be encountered alongside other fey creatures or as minions of powerful fey lords.
environment: Typically found in wooded areas or places associated with fey magic.
strengths: High Strength and Charisma scores allow it to perform powerful physical attacks and excel in charm-related abilities.
weaknesses: Average Wisdom makes it susceptible to certain forms of magic; vulnerable to cold iron weapons.
attacks: Uses Multiattack with two Chain Whip attacks and one Hooves attack, dealing bludgeoning damage and grappling foes.
most_powerful_ability: Beguiling Aura, which charms creatures and compels them to approach and mount it.
senses: Possesses darkvision enabling it to see in dim light up to 30 feet.
skills: Has low perception skills with a +0 modifier, making it average at detecting hidden creatures or traps.
additional_information: Can resist nonmagic bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from weapons not made with cold iron.
Nightmarish Ride ability paralyzes and restrains mounted creatures until dawn.
Charm lasts for one minute unless a saving throw is successful.
If a creature succeeds on its saving throw after taking damage, it gains immunity to the Púca’s charm for 24 hours.
Grappling capabilities make it dangerous in melee encounters.
test_queries: charming fey creature that can disappear
manipulative large creature with beguiling ability
fey creature that charms and escapes
